byline.contributor: Richard Fausset and Alan Blinder contributed reporting from Atlanta.

abstract: Alabama Supreme Court orders probate judges to cease issuing marriage licenses to same-sex couples, in defiance of federal ruling that ban on such unions violates United States Constitution.
lead_paragraph: The order by the state’s Supreme Court was in direct opposition to a federal judge’s ruling.

headline.main: Alabama Court Orders a Halt to Same-Sex Marriage Licenses
headline.print_headline: Alabama Court Halts Licenses for Same-Sex Marriages

snippet: The order by the state’s Supreme Court was in direct opposition to a federal judge’s ruling.

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
